cats.head: Playful Cats in Hats
cats.text: Princess Leia begs Obi-Paws Kenobi for help. He is her only hope to defeat Empurror Palpatine. Source: Pinterest

cats.head: Serious, Businesslike Cats in Hats
cats.text: A businesslike cat, managing his serious business, in his serious top hat. Source: The Japan Times
